title: What is the metaphysical meaning of pain and illness according to this text?
first_phrase: In the previous paragraphs, the author describes a personal experience of connecting with the night sky and experiencing a transformation within himself. In the last 200 tokens, the author delves into the metaphysics of pain and illness, referencing the writings of "Iagla" and Nietzsche to suggest that these experiences represent an excess of psychological and physical energy that the individual has not been able to process or address. The author presents a spiritual perspective on these issues, suggesting that they are connected to deeper aspects of the individual's being.

Sí può completare questa idea, con un'altra, espres sa da Nietzsche nella sua opera 'Volontà di Potenza (§ 304), dove egli connette il dolore alla paura, vi vede la ripercussione di uno shock provocato dalla paura nel focolare centrale (egli veramente aggiunge: del sistema nervoso ma dicendo semplicemente « focolare cen trale » si dice meglio), con una lunga sensazione che poi va a proiettarsi nella sede di un organo deter minato. Dal punto di vista esoterico, ecco di che si tratta.
last_phrase: In conclusion, pain and suffering are the result of a fixed consciousness that reacts with fear and contraction when facing a transcendent force. Understanding this can help us work towards a more open and liberated consciousness that is not plagued by unnecessary suffering.
